author: Fred Guterl
title: Amid Coronavirus, Experts Question When It's Safe To Go Back to Work, Lockdown Had No 'Exit Strategy'
description: Deciding to lift the lockdown is difficult because very little is known about the COVID-19 virus and testing is woefully inadequate in the U.S. But the longer the disruption goes on, the more difficult it will be for the economy to recover..
content: Texas Lt. Gov. Dan Patrick, who at 69 would be relatively vulnerable to the ravages of COVID-19, offered on Monday to make the ultimate sacrifice. He said he'd be "all in" for lifting the nation's lockdown and getting Americans back to work. The next day, Pre… [+6048 chars]
